mapper.insert: insert into prision_prisioner (prision_id, prision_name, prision_age, prision_home, prision_card, prision_enter_date, prision_finsh_date, prision_danger_level_id, prision_relative_tel, prision_police_id) values (#{prisionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prisionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prisionAge,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{prisionHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prisionCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prisionEnterDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{prisionFinshDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{prisionDangerLevelId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{prisionRelativeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prisionPoliceId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select prision_id, prision_name, prision_age, prision_home, prision_card, prision_enter_date, prision_finsh_date, prision_danger_level_id, prision_relative_tel, prision_police_id from prision_prisioner where prision_id = #{prisionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
